description: Table for general organ information about transplanted and native organs.

columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: TX_ORG_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
State of the body where organ came from


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Living


Donation after Brain Death


Donation after Circulatory Death 


Auto

columns.name: TX_DNR_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Relation of donor to recipient


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Mother - Biological


Father - Biological


Brother - Biological


Sister - Biological


Twin Brother - Biological


Twin Sister - Biological


Half Brother - Biological


Half Sister - Biological


Son - Biological


Daughter - Biological


Related Other - Biological


Domino - Biological


Non-Domino Therapeutic - Biological


Spouse - Non-Biological


Life Partner - Non-Biological


Paired Donation - Non-Biological


Living/Deceased Donation - Non-Biological


Anonymous - Non-Biological


Anonymous Humanitarian - Non-Biological


Anonymous Directed - Non-Biological


Domino - Non-Biological


Non-Domino Therapeutic - Non-Biological


Other - Non-Biological

columns.name: ORG_DEATH_ID
columns.description: Reasons for organ graft death

columns.name: ORG_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Note about the organ

columns.name: ORG_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status of organ throughout the transplant procedure


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Inactive


Pre-Procurement


Procured


Transplanted


Failed


In Rejection


Partially Functioning

columns.name: ORG_WT
columns.description: Organ's weight in ounces.

columns.name: ANTIGEN_MATCHES
columns.description: Number of antigen matches 0 - 6

columns.name: ORG_PROCUREMENT_DT
columns.description: Procurement date of organ from donor

columns.name: ORG_PERFUSION_MIN
columns.description: Perfusion time of organ minutes component

columns.name: ORG_WISCHEMIA_MIN
columns.description: Time in warm ischemia minutes component

columns.name: ORG_CISCHEMIA_MIN
columns.description: Time spent in cold ischemia minute component

columns.name: CLAMP_INST_ON_TM
columns.description: Instant when clamp was put on

columns.name: CLAMP_INST_OFF_TM
columns.description: Instant clamp taken off

columns.name: ORG_DONATION_CRIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores if the organ is classified as a standard criteria donor or an expanded criteria donor.  This is a donor classification.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Standard Criteria Donor


Expanded Criteria Donor

columns.name: PRIMARY_WARM_ISCH
columns.description: Minutes organ is in primary warm ischemia

columns.name: ORG_FAIL_DT
columns.description: Date which the transplanted organ failed

columns.name: ORG_FAIL_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Method by which organ failure date was determined


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Retransplanted


Graft Removed


Resumption of Dialysis


Failed w/o Further Treatment


Death - Functioning Graft


Death - Failed Graft


Resumption of Insulin

columns.name: ORG_MATCHTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores what kind of match type the organ was


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Identical


Haplo


Non Match

columns.name: ORG_PRESERVE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Technique used for preserving the organ


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Ice


Pump


Ice/Pump

columns.description: Final flow rate at transplant if organ was on a pump

columns.name: ORGAN_REMOVAL_DT
columns.description: Date the organ was removed after it failed.

columns.name: UNOS_PRIMARY_FAIL_C_NAME

Other

Infection

columns.name: UNOS_PRIMARY_OTHER
columns.description: Free text entry listing the primary reason for organ failure. If no entry exists in the category list, this explains the reason for organ failure.

columns.name: ORGAN_NUM
columns.description: The sequential number of the organ transplanted.

columns.name: ORGAN_SIZE
columns.description: The volume of the organ in mL.

columns.name: UNOS_CONTRIB_OTHER
columns.description: Free text entry listing a contributory cause of organ failure. If no entry exists in the category list, this explains the reason for organ failure.

columns.name: NATIVE_ORGAN_YN
columns.description:
Set flag to yes to indicate that the record is for a native organ

No


Yes

columns.name: OPO_RISK_YN
columns.description:
Whether the donor is considered high risk by the organ procurement organization.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NATIVE_ORGAN_YN

columns.name: LINKED_ORGAN_ID
columns.description: If the current organ is linked to another organ, this stores the ID of the linked organ. This linked organ provides the donor information for the current organ.

columns.name: EXT_TEAM_RECOVER_YN
columns.description:
Was the organ procured by an external team.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NATIVE_ORGAN_YN

columns.description: The facility where the organ was recovered.

columns.name: REC_FAC_OTHER
columns.description: The facility where the organ was recovered, if none is listed in the organ recovery facility.

columns.description: Total ischemia time in minutes.

columns.name: A_MISMATCHES_NUM
columns.description: Indicate the number of A mismatches between the donor and the recipient.

columns.name: B_MISMATCHES_NUM
columns.description: Indicate the number of B mismatches between the donor and the recipient.

columns.name: DR_MISMATCHES_NUM
columns.description: Indicate the number of DR mismatches between the donor and the recipient.

columns.name: POSTOP_BLOOD_TRANS
columns.description: The number of post-operative blood transfusions.

columns.description: Indicates a specific free-text donor relation when the donor relation category list is insufficient.

columns.name: MACHINE_PERFUSION_ST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the organ perfusion started.

columns.name: MACHINE_PERFUSION_END_UTC_DTTM
